name: Remove - Welcome to the #New Twitter!
description:
Removes the annoying 'Welcome to the #New Twitter' bar!

Does the 'Welcome to the #New Twitter' bar annoy you?

Now you can remove it, just install this simple script!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

AVAILABLE ON USERSCRIPTS.ORG TOO!
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/100096

Please note; only the userscript version will notify you when an update is available,
so if you use Greasemonkey, you are advised to install from this site!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You may also like 'Remove - Set Facebook as your homepage'
http://userstyles.org/styles/45610/remove-set-facebook-as-your-homepage

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
